story_28_08000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Uhh, am I hearing things, or did Lear really just
say “please” to us?
story_28_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
W-well, he didn’t ask to postpone the matches
that time with Elesa...
story_28_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
He said pwease! That’s the magic word!
I’ll wait for tomorrow wike Wear says!
story_28_08000/2401_1001_0500_10: Me, too! Lear’s not even a bad guy!
story_28_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Once, he even rescued our Pokémon from
Team Break!
story_28_08000/2401_1001_0800_10:
W-well, we did just witness him put his neck on
the line to defend the PML today...
story_28_08000/2401_1001_1000_10: Go, Master Wear! You can do it!
story_28_08000/2401_1001_1100_10: Yeah! I can wait, too! I vote postpone!
story_28_08000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Same! I mean, he saved everybody from Team
Break! What’s another day or two?
story_28_08000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I can’t wait to see everyone go all out in the
match tomorrow! It’s gonna be awesome!
story_28_08000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Good luck, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
And good luck, Lear!
